resp = client.security.put_role_mapping(
    name="mapping7",
    roles=[
        "ldap-example-user"
    ],
    enabled=True,
    rules={
        "all": [
            {
                "field": {
                    "dn": "*,ou=subtree,dc=example,dc=com"
                }
            },
            {
                "field": {
                    "realm.name": "ldap1"
                }
            }
        ]
    },
)
print(resp)
